casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Seid Michael MOSTAFAVI 199A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 20, 2017 Joseph P. Lattimore, Attorney at Law, for Mostafavi, Seid Michael. Brent Kiziah, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of June 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of June 2017."
